Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 41st overall pick, by New York in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off George Freeland (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2019, off Matthew Yard (MIL)...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2019...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 6/19/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2020, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Oakland on 9/14/2020...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/8/2021 to a 4-year deal worth $6,250,000 per year...
Injured on 6/18/2021 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
